title: Asking about bus routes
context: Ask a local which bus line will take you downtown.

neutral.text: What bus do I take to get downtown?
Can you tell me which bus goes to the city center?
How do I get to downtown by bus?
Which bus route takes me to the downtown area?
I need to get downtown, what bus should I take?
Can I get downtown on this bus?
Do you know which bus line goes to downtown?

informal.text: How do I get downtown on the bus?
Can you help me find the bus to downtown?
I'm trying to get downtown, what's the best bus?
Do you take this bus to get downtown?
Is this the bus that goes to the city center?
How long does it take to get downtown by bus?

formal.text: Could you please inform me about the bus route to downtown?
I would like to know which bus line services the downtown area.
Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to downtown by bus?
I am trying to get to downtown and I need to know the bus number.
Could you provide me with information about the bus schedule to downtown?

patterns.meaning: Asking about the specific bus to take

patterns.template: How do I [option] to downtown by bus?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Excuse me, which bus line goes downtown?

lines.speaker: Local
lines.text: You can take the number 10 bus to get downtown.

dialogs.description: Asking a bus driver for information

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Does this bus go to downtown?

lines.speaker: Bus Driver
lines.text: Yes, this bus will take you to the city center.
